Path: Path for Pretty People¶

Path provide highly readable API to access and manipulate both filesystem path and URL path.

>>> p = path.Path('c:\\hello\world.py')
>>> p.name
'world'
>>> p.ext
'.py'
>>> p = path.HttpPath('https://github.com/docopt/docopt')
>>> p.path
'/docopt/docopt'
>>> p.name
'world'
>>> p.ext
'.py'
